page.title: 19LIFE AT SCHOOL IN CAYTON
page.content: I have lived in Cayton all my life and it is very peaceful here. I go to the pimary school and enjoy it. I like most of the lessons and all the sport. I don't like exams much but usually they are not quite so bad as expected. I have dinner at shool and like most of the food but hate mushy peas. Actually I like sweet food better than meat or potatoes. Most of the time I wear casual clothes like T_shirts and jeans and body_warmers. On special occasions like concerts when I am in the choir or orchestra I wear our school colours _ royal blue and white. Sometimes I have to wear a suit and tie which I don't much like doing. This year I leave primary school and go on to the comprehensive school. I'm a bit frightened but I suppose I'll be all right when I get there.
